posts.post_content:
These 3 cards were recent eBay purchases with the intentions of crossing each over to an SGC 50 VG-EX.  However, they would not cross as they did not meet the minimum grade requested.  I thought I would try to sell them here first before putting them back on eBay.  

Johnny Bates (eBay #290405747861) paid $84, will sell for $75 SOLD
[IMG]http://i185.photobucket.com/albums/x137/vintagetoppsguy/Vintage%20Cards/Bates.jpg[/IMG]

Chick Gandil (eBay #160405652845) paid $157, will sell for $145 SOLD
[IMG]http://i185.photobucket.com/albums/x137/vintagetoppsguy/Vintage%20Cards/Gandil.jpg[/IMG]

Carlos Smith (eBay #270534571903) paid $187, will sell for $175 SOLD
[IMG]http://i185.photobucket.com/albums/x137/vintagetoppsguy/Vintage%20Cards/Smith.jpg[/IMG]

All prices include delivery.  Will give discount if purchasing more than 1 card, other than that the prices are FIRM.

Hi,

Interested in Gandil if you'll ship to England (more than happy to pay for additional postage cost)

Martin

[url]marpar73@hotmail.com[/url]
